name: Nonrhythmic Breakfast
description:
Description

A rhythm game without a rhythm. Eat breakfast to generate music and fill up your stomach but avoid bacteria and biting your tongue. This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 in GameMaker Studio 2 in about two days. If I had more time I would've cleaned up the tutorial screen a bit but I'm pretty happy with how the game turned out overall. I don't think this game followed the theme of the jam very well either as rhythm isn't really a mechanic but whatever.

Controls

You can eat with the spacebar or the A button if you're using a controller. You can pause with escape or the start button if you're using a controller.
